price: [Si lo intentaran,] llamaradas de fuego y cobre fundido les serían lanzadas y no podrían defenderse.
arabic: يُرۡسَلُ عَلَيۡكُمَا شُوَاظٞ مِّن نَّارٖ وَنُحَاسٞ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yur'salu ʿalaykumā shuwāẓun min nārin wanuḥāsun falā tantaṣirāni
translations: you will (be able to) defend yourselves
